content.raw: Hmm, ok well then i'm a bit stumped as to why this is happening then. What's happening is, in IHMC's java code, the following line `controlThreadProcessor = socket.getCore(2).getDefaultProcessor();` is failing because it thinks you only have 2 cores, so with zero indexing core 2 doesn't exist.
content.html: Hmm, ok well then i'm a bit stumped as to why this is happening then. What's happening is, in IHMC's java code, the following line controlThreadProcessor = socket.getCore(2).getDefaultProcessor(); is failing because it thinks you only have 2 cores, so with zero indexing core 2 doesn't exist.
